verses.verse: SAVE me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength,
Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
For strangers are risen up against me, and the mighty seek after my life; they have disregarded thee, O God.
Behold, God is my helper; the LORD sustains my soul.
Bring disaster to mine enemies; silence them in thy truth.
I will freely sacrifice to thee; I will praise thy name, O LORD, for it is good;
For thou hast delivered me out of all troubles; and mine eye hath seen mine enemies defeated.
